Name: Serial Installment
Description: A "serial installment" is a portion of a work of literature which has been published in installments. Stand-alone excerpts of a larger work should use the "excerpt" type. Works which, by their very nature, are serial in form, such as comic books, should not use this type.

Properties.Name: Serialized Work
Properties.Description: The title of the larger work that this is an installment of.
